name: Vecna, God of Lore, Ruins and Revelation

entity.name: Vecna, God of Lore, Ruins and Revelation
entity.entry:
• Progressive, Unveiling: Uncovers hidden truths and their consequences
  • Appearance: A lich-like figure with a missing eye and hand, replaced by magical artifacts
  • Personality: Secretive, cunning, and obsessed with hidden knowledge
  • Church: Collects and guards secrets, trains spies and information brokers, and reveals hidden truths at crucial moments
  • Edicts: Uncover forbidden secrets, hoard knowledge, manipulate from the shadows.
  • Anathema: Reveal secrets, act openly, trust others fully.
  • Domains: Knowledge, Magic, Secrecy, Death, Time
  • Divine Font: Harm.
  • Sanctification: Unholy.
  • Favored Animal: Raven.
  • Favored Creature: Ghosts.
  • Favored Material: Bone.
  • Favored Color: Grey.
  • Favored Weapon: Dagger, Staff, Dart, Sickle, Scythe, Wish Blade, Wish Knife

Cleric Outfit: Vecna’s clerics wear grey, tattered robes that conceal their forms entirely, often with hoods pulled low over their faces. Their daggers are hidden in the folds of their robes, and they wear bone talismans representing the price of immortality. They carry grimoires of forbidden lore bound in flesh, symbolizing their devotion to secret knowledge and the dark arts.
